author: R Sivaraman
text:
The Principal District Sessions Court on Thursday convicted and sentenced two persons — a conductor and engineering student — to life-imprisonment for kidnapping a minor girl and raping her on January 1, 2013.

Delivering the judgment, Principal District Sessions Judge C.V. Karthikeyan said the victim, who secured 470 out of 500 in 10{+t}{+h}standard examinations, had taken the biology group in Plus-Two. “She was deceived and kidnapped by the accused to commit the crime. The crime destroyed her mentally,” he said.

On the fateful day, she was standing at the bus stop in Villianur when Muthu approached her saying that her mother had met with an accident. He offered to take her to the hospital. The victim accompanied him and the second accused, Venkatachalamurthy (22), joined them. The accused took the girl to Gandhkuppam, Thiruvennai Nallur and raped her. They left her at the Villupuram bus stand from where the victim called her parents.
title: 2 get life term for rape of minor
